towers.name: fast-access
towers.description: Fast shooting tower that provides low damage.

towers.name: cabinets
towers.description: Provides moderate damage with a balanced attack speed.

towers.name: server-control
towers.description: Creates a control zone that slows down enemies within its range.

towers.name: hub
towers.description: Slows down enemies significantly within its range.

towers.name: switch
towers.description: Short range tower that gives boost to friendly towers.

towers.name: cell-tower
towers.description: A powerful tower that deals damage in a wide AOE area.

towers.name: satellite-tower
towers.description: Tower that can hit everywhere on the map for devastating damage.

towers.name: signal
towers.description: Slow firing, long distance, hard hitting tower.
